projects.name: 6-Robot Cell Project 2025 (Complete with Installation & Commissioning)
projects.description: Complete design, manufacturing, shipping, installation, and commissioning of a 6-robot cell for automotive spot welding with 47-second cycle time target. Includes comprehensive shipping and logistics coordination, site installation with parallel tasks, PLC commissioning, and robot commissioning. Project timeline: January 1 - June 27, 2025.

workUnits.name: Joint Data Import & Validation
workUnits.description: Import and validate joint data from CAD system. Ensure all weld/sealer points are correctly identified and positioned for the 6-robot cell configuration.

checkpoints.name: Data Import Complete
checkpoints.description: All joint data successfully imported from CAD system

checkpoints.name: Data Validation Complete
checkpoints.description: All weld/sealer points validated and positioned correctly

workUnits.name: Sequence Chart Development
workUnits.description: Develop comprehensive sequence chart for 6-robot cell operation. Define robot coordination, cycle timing, and safety interlocks to achieve 47-second cycle time.

checkpoints.name: Initial Sequence Created
checkpoints.description: Basic robot sequence chart developed

checkpoints.name: Cycle Time Optimization
checkpoints.description: Sequence optimized to meet 47-second target

workUnits.name: Robot Cell Simulation
workUnits.description: Create comprehensive robot cell simulation including all 6 robots, fixtures, and tooling. Validate collision-free operation and optimize robot paths.

checkpoints.name: Simulation Model Created
checkpoints.description: Complete 6-robot cell simulation model built

checkpoints.name: Collision Analysis Complete
checkpoints.description: All robot paths validated as collision-free

workUnits.name: Robot Equipment List Generation
workUnits.description: Generate detailed robot equipment specifications including robot types, software packages, options, and configurations based on simulation requirements.

checkpoints.name: Robot Specifications Complete
checkpoints.description: All robot types and configurations specified

checkpoints.name: Software Packages Defined
checkpoints.description: All required software packages and options specified

workUnits.name: Custom Fixture Manufacturing
workUnits.description: Manufacture custom fixtures and tooling for the 6-robot cell based on design specifications. Includes grippers, tool changers, and specialized tooling.

checkpoints.name: Fixture Design Released
checkpoints.description: All fixture designs released to manufacturing

checkpoints.name: Manufacturing Complete
checkpoints.description: All custom fixtures manufactured and inspected

workUnits.name: Robot Procurement & Delivery
workUnits.description: Procure 6 robots with specified configurations and software packages. Coordinate delivery timing with installation schedule.

checkpoints.name: Purchase Orders Issued
checkpoints.description: All robot purchase orders issued to manufacturers

checkpoints.name: Robots Delivered
checkpoints.description: All 6 robots delivered to site

workUnits.name: Custom Items Shipping Coordination
workUnits.description: Coordinate shipping of custom manufactured items including fixtures, tooling, and specialized components. Ensure timely delivery for installation.

checkpoints.name: Shipping Arranged
checkpoints.description: All custom items shipping arranged

checkpoints.name: Custom Items Delivered
checkpoints.description: All custom items delivered to site

workUnits.name: Site Preparation & Marking
workUnits.description: Mark cell area using measuring equipment relative to datum. Mark robot positions, fixture locations, electrical panel locations, and pneumatic piping routes.

checkpoints.name: Cell Area Marked
checkpoints.description: Cell area marked with all positions relative to datum

workUnits.name: Equipment Installation (Parallel)
workUnits.description: Install all equipment including robots, fixtures, electrical panels, and pneumatic equipment. This task runs in parallel with other installation activities.

checkpoints.name: Robots Mounted
checkpoints.description: All 6 robots mounted and secured

checkpoints.name: Fixtures Installed
checkpoints.description: All fixtures and tooling installed

checkpoints.name: Equipment Installation Complete
checkpoints.description: All equipment mounted and secured

workUnits.name: Systems Integration
workUnits.description: Integrate electrical, pneumatic, and safety systems. Install trunking, wiring, piping, fencing, and electrical panels.

checkpoints.name: Electrical Systems Integrated
checkpoints.description: All electrical systems installed and connected

checkpoints.name: Pneumatic Systems Integrated
checkpoints.description: All pneumatic systems installed and connected

checkpoints.name: Safety Systems Validated
checkpoints.description: All safety systems installed and validated

workUnits.name: PLC Commissioning
workUnits.description: Download PLC offline program, perform I/O checking and validation, validate sequence, and download HMI. Power-on milestone for PLC system.

checkpoints.name: PLC Program Downloaded
checkpoints.description: PLC offline program downloaded and functional

checkpoints.name: I/O Validation Complete
checkpoints.description: All I/O devices tested and validated

checkpoints.name: Sequence Validation Complete
checkpoints.description: Machine operation sequence validated

checkpoints.name: HMI Operational
checkpoints.description: HMI interface downloaded and operational

workUnits.name: Robot Commissioning
workUnits.description: Download robot offline program, validate paths with/without parts, program each point, set up program structure, and configure robot-to-robot coordination. Power-on milestone for robot system.

checkpoints.name: Robot Programs Downloaded
checkpoints.description: All robot offline programs downloaded and functional

checkpoints.name: Path Validation Complete
checkpoints.description: All robot paths validated as collision-free

checkpoints.name: Point Programming Complete
checkpoints.description: All weld/sealer points programmed and tested

checkpoints.name: Program Structure Established
checkpoints.description: Master program structure and subroutines created

checkpoints.name: Robot Coordination Validated
checkpoints.description: Robot-to-robot coordination and synchronization working

workUnits.name: Final Testing & Production Handoff
workUnits.description: Perform comprehensive testing of the complete 6-robot cell system. Validate cycle time, quality, and safety. Hand over to production team.

checkpoints.name: System Testing Complete
checkpoints.description: Complete system testing performed

checkpoints.name: Cycle Time Validation
checkpoints.description: 47-second cycle time target achieved

checkpoints.name: Quality Validation
checkpoints.description: All quality requirements met

checkpoints.name: Production Handoff
checkpoints.description: System handed over to production team

equipment.name: CAD Workstation
equipment.specifications: High-performance CAD workstation with 3D modeling software

equipment.name: Simulation Workstation
equipment.specifications: High-performance simulation workstation with robot simulation software

equipment.name: CNC Machine
equipment.specifications: 5-axis CNC machine for custom fixture manufacturing

equipment.name: Procurement System
equipment.specifications: Enterprise procurement and supplier management system

equipment.name: Measuring Equipment
equipment.specifications: Precision measuring equipment for site marking and validation

equipment.name: Installation Equipment
equipment.specifications: Cranes, lifts, and installation tools for equipment mounting

equipment.name: Integration Equipment
equipment.specifications: Electrical and pneumatic integration tools and equipment

equipment.name: Testing Equipment
equipment.specifications: Comprehensive testing equipment for system validation

milestones.name: Design Phase Complete
milestones.description: All design work completed and approved

milestones.name: Site Installation Complete
milestones.description: All equipment installed and systems integrated

milestones.name: Production Handoff
milestones.description: Complete system handed over to production

qualityGates.name: Design Review Gate
qualityGates.description: All design work reviewed and approved

qualityGates.name: Manufacturing Quality Gate
qualityGates.description: All custom manufacturing meets quality standards

qualityGates.name: PLC Commissioning Gate
qualityGates.description: PLC system fully commissioned and operational

qualityGates.name: Robot Commissioning Gate
qualityGates.description: Robot system fully commissioned and operational
